summary: This document is a communication from Richard Kahn of HBRK Associates Inc. regarding the balance in an account at Deutsche Bank. Kahn expresses the intention to begin wire transfers and seeks confirmation that the account is properly funded.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about the balance of an account at Deutsche Bank to ensure it is properly funded for wire transfers.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, New York 10022
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is associated with HBRK Associates Inc.
The communication is regarding the balance in an account at Deutsche Bank.
Kahn intends to begin wire transfers from the account.
The document contains a confidentiality notice.
The communication is marked as confidential under federal rules.
